solution_line_template: After losing {lost_legos} legos, Nellie has {initial_legos} - {lost_legos} = <<{initial_legos}-{lost_legos}={after_losing_legos}>>{after_losing_legos} legos.

After giving her sister {given_to_sister_legos} legos Nellie has {after_losing_legos} - {given_to_sister_legos} = <<{after_losing_legos}-{given_to_sister_legos}={remaining_legos}>>{remaining_legos} legos
